text: Ricky Kambuaya (born May 5, 1996), is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a attacking midfielder for Liga 1 club Persebaya Surabaya. ==Career== ===PS Mojokerto Putra=== In 2017, Kambuaya signed a year contract with PS Mojokerto Putra. Kambuaya scored ten goals in the 2017 season, when PSMP played in the second division. He is originally from Papua. ===PSS Sleman=== On 28 January 2019, Kambuaya signed a year contract with PSS Sleman along other players, Derry Rachman, Haris Tuharea, and Jajang Sukmara. ===Persebaya Surabaya=== On 11 January 2020, Kambuaya start unofficial debut for Persebaya Surabaya on friendly match vs Persis Solo . ==Honours== ===Club=== Persebaya Surabaya * East Java Governor Cup: 2020 ==References== == External links == *Ricky Kambuaya - Profile at Soccerway Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:PSS Sleman players Category:PS Mojokerto Putra players
title: Ricky Kambuaya
